name: UWC Adriatic
description: Founded in 1982 as the fifth UWC college, UWC Adriatic has a spectacular location in north-eastern Italy.

name: UWC Atlantic
description: The founding college of the UWC movement. The college is located in the 12th century St. Donat’s Castle in the Vale of Glamorgan.

name: UWC Changshu
description: Founded in 2015 as the only UWC college in mainland China. The college is situated in the 3,000 year old city of Changshu on the banks of Kuncheng Lake.

name: UWC Costa Rica
description: Set in the vibrant city of Santa Ana, the only Latin American UWC offers the opportunity to learn and explore as part of a diverse and supportive community.

name: UWC Dilijan
description: Set in a spectacular national park, UWC Dilijan gives students the chance to learn, explore and contribute to community life in Armenia.

name: UWC East Africa
description: Founded in 1969 and located on the slopes of Africa’s highest mountain, Kilimanjaro, with two campuses in Moshi and Arusha.

name: UWC ISAK Japan
description: Formerly the International School of Asia (Karuizawa), UWC ISAK is located in a beautiful resort town in Nagano Prefecture, host of the 1998 Winter Olympics.

name: UWC Li Po Chun
description: The Hong Kong-based college offers students an opportunity to develop a deeper understanding of Asia.

name: UWC Maastricht
description: The only state-supported UWC school, Netherlands-based UWC Maastricht has students from over 90 countries and territories.

name: UWC Mahindra
description: Located in a beautiful conservation reserve, UWC Mahindra College offers students the opportunity to explore and serve the communities of India.

name: UWC Mostar
description: The first college to have an explicit aim to contribute to the reconstruction of a post-conflict society. It is also the first UWC college to be housed within an existing public school.

name: UWC Pearson College
description: At the Canada-based college, students can study local wildlife and contribute to the community, both on and off campus.

name: UWC Red Cross Nordic
description: Set next to a Norwegian fjord, UWC Red Cross Nordic gives students insight into traditions of Nordic countries and the work of the Red Cross.

name: UWC Robert Bosch College
description: Founded in 2013 as the only UWC college in Germany, UWC Robert Bosch College is set in an eco-friendly city near the Black Forest.

name: UWC South East Asia
description: Opened in 1971, UWC South East Asia expanded in the 1990s to include primary students. The Singapore-based school now has nearly 5,300 students.

name: UWC Thailand
description: Founded as Phuket International Academy in 2009, UWC Thailand is a warm, caring learning community that offers an all round education with social emotional learning and mindfulness at its core.

name: UWC USA
description: The New Mexico-based college sits on a 200-acre site on the edge of the Pecos Wilderness.

name: UWC Waterford Kamhlaba
description: This Swaziland-based school, which has a long anti-apartheid history, offers students an opportunity to experience the diverse realities of a modern African country.
